title: The Damned Don't Cry (restored, with intro and outro) (1950, film noir, imdb score: 7.1)

sources.title: The Damned Don't Cry (restored, with intro and outro) (1950, film noir, imdb score: 7.1)
sources.description: The Damned Don't Cry (promoted as The Damned Don't Cry! ) is a 1950 American film noir crime drama directed by Vincent Sherman and featuring Joan Crawford , David Brian and Steve Cochran . The plot concerns a woman's involvement with an organized-crime boss and his subordinates. The screenplay by Harold Medford and Jerome Weidman was based on the story "Case History" written by Gertrude Walker , loosely based on the relationship of Bugsy Siegel and Virginia Hill . The Damned Don't Cry is the first of three cinematic collaborations between Sherman and Crawford along with Harriet Craig (1950) and Goodbye, My Fancy (1951).
